dialogue: After Spirit lands on Exus, she heads
straight to the place Shandy told her of.
She then looks for someone who fits Shandy's description.
And by chance she sees him at the marketplace...
Oi, What do you think you're doing?
How dare you get in the way of the soldiers of the Empire!
Oh, I'm so sorry, officer. My foot must have slipped.
...just as he was getting into some trouble.
Spirit watches as the man slowly backed away from the officers.
It was then that Spirt noticed a child cowering behind the man.
She decides to act, to both get the job over
with and to help the child.
She causes a distraction to give the two a chance to run.
Hey, why don't you soldiers go make yourselves useful
Spirit watches the two run away, and prepares to run away herself.
